amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Multilateral Economic Assistance Account in the State Foreign Operations section of the bill by $211,244,700 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 29 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce several multilateral accounts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Heller amendment (A062) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 241 (Roll no. 78).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Heller amendment (A062) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 241 (Roll no. 78).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A062) offered by Mr. Heller.
